__e: Leonard, I mean, you're not only the love of my life. I mean, you're my best friend, and you've got a friend in me.

You're still innocent, Leonard, whether the world sees it that way or not.

Well, then do me a favor and tell Leonard that he can drop dead.
Leonard popped the question and I said yes!
Oh, Leonard talked a lot about him.

I'm sorry Leonard and Penny hurt your feelings.

We must finish the picture with you as Leonard and me...as me!
